Title: Bienvenue à Marly-Gomont
Writer: Benoît Graffin (adaptation), Benoît Graffin (dialogue), Benoît Graffin (screenplay), Julien Rambaldi (adaptation), Julien Rambaldi (dialogue), Julien Rambaldi (screenplay), Kamini Zantoko (adaptation), Kamini Zantoko (dialogue), Kamini Zantoko (original idea)
Actors: Marc Zinga, Aïssa Maïga, Bayron Lebli, Médina Diarra
Plot: The story of Seyolo Zantoko, who as a freshly graduated doctor of Congolese descent in France, struggled with his family to integrate in a small rural village, and ended up being considered as one of the most respected doctors in the area.
